html: This is a vindication of President Trump on the issue of Russian collusion. Congressional Democrats have long said we need to respect the findings of the Special Counsel and it’s time they put aside their hatred for President Trump and do just that.
text: This is a vindication of President Trump on the issue of Russian collusion. Congressional Democrats have long said we need to respect the findings of the Special Counsel and it’s time they put aside their hatred for President Trump and do just that.

html: I am pleased to see the release of Special Prosecutor Robert Mueller’s report, which confirms what many of us believed and what was outlined in the Attorney General’s memo: there was no collusion between President Trump, his campaign and the Russians.
text: I am pleased to see the release of Special Prosecutor Robert Mueller’s report, which confirms what many of us believed and what was outlined in the Attorney General’s memo: there was no collusion between President Trump, his campaign and the Russians.

html: This was the 7th straight month that year-over-year wage gains were at or above 3%. Before #TaxCuts, hourly wage gains had not reached 3 percent since April 2009. #TaxDay #YouKeepMore

html: As the Lebanese gov't continues to stabilize, I underscored the importance of rooting out corruption and thwarting the influence of Iran and Hezbollah within Lebanon. It's critical the US continue to support an independent Lebanese Armed Forces (LAF).
text: As the Lebanese gov't continues to stabilize, I underscored the importance of rooting out corruption and thwarting the influence of Iran and Hezbollah within Lebanon. It's critical the US continue to support an independent Lebanese Armed Forces (LAF).

html: A strong relationship between US + Lebanon is essential to greater stability in the Middle East and I was pleased to see free and fair elections this past year in Lebanon. A peaceful formation of a government has shown Lebanon's commitment to pursuing democracy in the region.
text: A strong relationship between US + Lebanon is essential to greater stability in the Middle East and I was pleased to see free and fair elections this past year in Lebanon. A peaceful formation of a government has shown Lebanon's commitment to pursuing democracy in the region.

html: I am proud to be Lebanese-American. My family immigrated to Peoria from Lebanon through Ellis Island. I am grateful to represent 8k+ Lebanese-American families in Peoria. html: Not only did we pass my BRIDGE Act, but we also passed important IRS reform today. This bipartisan effort included my bill to empower taxpayers by directing the IRS to provide substantive responses to directives issued by the Taxpayer Advocate. READ ↓https://bit.ly/2WZpkZ0

html: BREAKING: My bipartisan bill to fix reemployment services, the BRIDGE for Workers Act, just passed the House by a vote of 393-24. html: Did you know: The 1st #SOTU was delivered by George Washington in 1790 when he gave an address to the First Congress, which was then in NY. 225+ years later, I am looking forward to having @POTUS in the Capitol tonight to hear the 96th in-person #SOTU. html: New Year, New Tax Code → By lowering rates and bringing simplicity, our bill brings relief to all Americans. That's why it would save a four-person family making the median income in our district $2,593 a year.pic.twitter.com/wv2GPO3TIk

text:

 Significantly increases the standard deduction to protect roughly double the amount of what you earn each year
 Expands the child tax credit to $2,000
 Lowers the corporate tax rate to 21%pic.twitter.com/e8Dh4BWdqt
